items.sentence: I have a feeling that something dreadful is going to happen.
I want to apologize for all the things I said earlier today.
Tom looked in the fridge to see what he could find to drink.
Tom seemed like he was about to burst into tears any minute.
You have to be very talented to do that the way Tom does it.
I know that I\'m supposed to enjoy this class, but I don\'t.
Tom thought Mary knew what time she was supposed to show up.
Tom told Mary that he was the captain of the wrestling team.
Tom hid the knife he\'d killed Mary with in John\'s bedroom.
The play was a lot of fun. I wish you could have been there.
